name: Down-Town: The Casino Heist
description:
The town has been corrupted by a Casino boss and his gang, and it's time to send a message,  listen to your heist boss and complete mission setups to perfect the heist, recruit a friend to help you on the raid and most importantly save the town, enjoy freemode after beating the game and enjoy a comedic open world of exploration...you will quickly learn why it's such a "Down-Town"

CONTROLS: Arrow Keys, Enter Key, Z&X Keys, Or use your Mouse for hyper fast gameplay with only 1 hand! And physically feel the heist with touchscreen support!

Created with love & passion by a very small team.

Please be kind with feedback, we listen.

Created By: Blazed Apps
